title: Justice

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player. You will Justify a reason to kill them. The following day, it will be revealed who was Justified against. If no one is hanged today, they will be hanged instead.
- At night, consume a bullet to shoot any number of players you've Justified against. You will clean them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with 2 bullets. Gain 2 more whenever any player you've Justified against is hanged, or 1 more whenever a player you've Justified against is killed at night, including by you.
- Players you've Justified against are framed as your role.
-  - **__Part of the Daily Streak faction__**
- If part of the Daily Streak faction, loses its Destiny and instead wins with Daily Streaks.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill four players you've Justified against.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny

desc:
Post 4658
*“Why you and number two here?”, he pokes the butt of the axe at my companion’s unmoving flesh. “It’s easy. He’s a coward. Can’t just stay up here and hide. I’m fixin’ to make wrongs right, so I taught him a lesson he won’t forget.”*
